data.SOURCE:
@AbapCatalog.viewEnhancementCategory: [#NONE]
@AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT_REQUIRED
@EndUserText.label: 'Onay Ekran覺 Verileri'
@Metadata.ignorePropagatedAnnotations: true
@ObjectModel.usageType:{
    serviceQuality: #X,
    sizeCategory: #S,
    dataClass: #MIXED
}
define view entity YI_PYM_DDL_APPROVEMENT_DATA 
as select from ypym_t_approve as approve 
inner join YI_PYM_DDL_PAYMENT_HEADER_INFO as header on header.paymentnumber = approve.paymentnumber
inner join YI_PYM_DDL_PAYMENT_AMOUNT as amount on amount.paymentnumber = approve.paymentnumber 
association[1..*] to YI_PYM_DDL_PAYMENT_ALL_DATA as _items on _items.PaymentNumber = approve.paymentnumber
{
    key approve.paymentnumber,
        header.listdate,
        header.companycode,
        @Semantics.amount.currencyCode: 'currency'
        amount.paymentamount,                
        amount.currency,
        header.paymentrequestdate,
        approve.approvergroupsequence,
        _items
} where approve.approver = $session.user
    and approve.approvementstatus = 'INPROCESS'

union

select from ypym_t_proxyapp as proxy inner join ypym_t_approve as approve on approve.approver = proxy.approver 
inner join YI_PYM_DDL_PAYMENT_HEADER_INFO as header on header.paymentnumber = approve.paymentnumber
inner join YI_PYM_DDL_PAYMENT_AMOUNT as amount on amount.paymentnumber = approve.paymentnumber 
association[1..*] to YI_PYM_DDL_PAYMENT_ALL_DATA as _items on _items.PaymentNumber = approve.paymentnumber
{
    key approve.paymentnumber,
        header.listdate,
        header.companycode,        
        amount.paymentamount,
        amount.currency,
        header.paymentrequestdate,
        approve.approvergroupsequence,
        _items
} where proxy.proxyapprover = $session.user
    and ( proxy.begindate <= $session.system_date and proxy.enddate >= $session.system_date )
    and approve.approvementstatus = 'INPROCESS'
    
/*+[internal] {

],

],
